story.text: Welcome to this [[Allyabase]] federated wiki. This is a privacy-first, decentralized knowledge base powered by the Planet Nine ecosystem.
[[Federated Wiki]] allows you to create, edit, and share pages. Each page can be forked to your own wiki, creating a decentralized network of knowledge.

# Getting Started

To launch your own Allyabase ecosystem:

1. Create an **[[allyabase]]** page
2. The plugin will automatically detect this page
3. Click the plugin button to launch your services
4. Your base will include: Julia, Fount, BDO, and more

# Forking Pages

To fork a page to your own wiki:

1. Click the **fork icon** (ðŸ”±) at the bottom of any page
2. The page will be copied to your wiki
3. You can edit your fork independently
4. Your changes won't affect the original page

This creates a decentralized web of knowledge where everyone owns their own content.

# Editing Pages

- **Double-click** any paragraph to edit
- **Drag** to reorder paragraphs
- Use **[[wiki links]]** to create connections between pages
- Your changes are saved locally in your wiki

The **journal** (ðŸ“–) at the bottom shows the complete history of edits and forks.

# Privacy & Ownership

- **No tracking**: This wiki doesn't collect analytics or user data
- **Local first**: All your content is stored on your own server
- **Sessionless auth**: Use cryptographic keys instead of passwords
- **Your data**: You own and control everything you create

# Learn More

- [[Allyabase]] - Launch your own Planet Nine base
- [[Federated Wiki]] - Understanding the wiki federation
- [[Planet Nine]] - The broader ecosystem
- [Federation Guide](http://fed.wiki.org/view/how-federation-works) - External resource
This wiki is part of the Planet Nine ecosystem - a privacy-first, decentralized platform for knowledge, commerce, and community. ðŸŒŒ
